name: Snowball's Journey
description:
Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Space to  jump
  • Left Mouse Button or Left/Right Control or E to throw a snowball

Gamepad is also supported

Snowball, a Yeti youngling, woke up from his very first, successfully completed hibernation and saw … nobody. The family burrow was completely deserted, all his family were gone.

On the flat tablestone in the main cave, there was something left. It was a large dried leaf with some scribbles on it. He recognised the other side of the valley, there was his family waiting for him!

He then took a careful view out of the burrow and saw a horde of strange people running loudly through his home woods, apparently searching for him. They must have entered through the old pass. The glacier that was plugging it must be gone, melted away...
